TopicTitle: Go Stock! (Movement to integrate the asteroid day mod into stock)

Articles.Content:
> 
> I cant subscribe till you post it mate.

> 
> Well, I really like that solar panel, but I think stock telescopes are long overdue.
> DuoDex starting a ragepost thread? Our "what do you love about KSP" guy? It's the end of the world. Anyway, I'm sure it will be thoughtful and nice.

Mostly just my ideas, coupled with some #kspofficial users' ideas, with a few moderators' contributions.

Essentially, it's a fair bit of "here's what some of the moderators and more active IRC people think would be cool in career mode" and a bit of "[insert complaints about stuff]".

It's been two weeks in the making so far, and I'm not entirely sure where/when I'll put it out. Don't get excited yet (if you were planning to do so at all ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif))

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T15:38:06Z" title="07/17/2015 03:38  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by DuoDex**
